Package ca.corefacility.gview.map.gui

Provides for implementations of a simple GUI for the GView map.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AboutDialog  
AboutMenuItem Responsible for creating the "About" menu item.
BEVDialog The bird's eye view dialog box.
BEVDialogListener A custom listener class for the BEV Dialog.
BEVMenuItem Responsible for creating and managing the Bird's Eye View menu item.
ExitMenuItem Creates the Exit menu item.
ExportMenuItem Responsible for creating the Export menu item.
FileMenu Responsible for creating the File menu.
FitMapToScreenMenuItem Responsible for creating the "Fit Image to Map" menu item.
FullScreenMenuItem Responsible for creating the "Full Screen" menu item.
GUIUtility Provides utility for the GUI.
GViewGUIFrame The GUI frame for GView.
HelpMenu Responsible for creating the help menu.
MoveDialog The custom move dialog box.
MoveMenu Responsible for creating the move menu.
OpenMenuItem Responsible for creating the Open menu item.
ScaleDialog The custom scale dialog box.
ScaleMenu Responsible for creating the Scale menu.
ShowAllMenuItem Responsible for creating and managing the "Show All" menu item.
ShowLabelsMenuItem Responsible for creating and managing the "Show Labels" menu item.
ShowLegendMenuItem Responsible for creating and managing the "Show Legend" menu item.
ShowRulerMenuItem Responsible for creating and managing the "Show Ruler" menu item.
SliderDialog Abstract custom slider dialog.
ViewerUsageMenuItem Responsible for creating and managing the Viewer Usage menu item.
ViewMenu Responsible for creating and managing the View menu on GView's menu bar.
WebsiteMenuItem Responsible for creating and managing the Website menu item.
ZoomDialog The custom zoom dialog box.
ZoomMenu Responsible for creating and managing the Zoom menu on GView's menu bar.
 

Package ca.corefacility.gview.map.gui Description

Provides for implementations of a simple GUI for the GView map.
